name: Police Bus Criminal Transport
description:
Bring criminals to justice, your job as a police officer is to transport criminals via airplane flights and through police bus. This is a special simulator game where the airplane fight is full of criminals and you are the Police pilot flying the plane as a special flight officer to bring criminals to justice. Take the prisoners on the bus first drive the bus carefully its full of prisoners, then board them on the airplane and take transport them carefully to the destination full of security and don’t any criminal escape.

Features:
• Intuitive bus driving controls
• Realistic police bus experience
• Transport simulators of prisoners transport
• Cutting edge graphics
• Thrilling offline Gameplay
• Mission of transporting criminals to hill jail
